name: hurl a ball
description:
-Controls

You can hurl the ball with the left mouse button.

-Game jam

This game was first a submission to the weekly game jam week 164, but i haven't finished the game in the time delay. The game jams theme was "Hurl".

-Goal of the game

You've to pass 10 difficult levels. You must reach the yellow Flag of the end of a level.

-Games a was inspired by

Balls by Dani.

The old arcade games.

Will you snail by Jonas Tyroller.

-Creator

This is a game made by Ryder Studios.

The name of the creator is Daniel Münstermann. He's programmer, 2D artist and sound designer.  If you want to see more of Ryder Studios check the youtube channel called Ryder Studios out.
